2023-11-21.title: Share a Bible verse on social media and discuss its relevance.
2023-11-21.question: How did the verse resonate with your online community?

2023-11-22.title: Read a Psalm and use it as a basis for your prayer time.
2023-11-22.question: What aspects of God's character are highlighted in the Psalm, and how can you apply them in your prayers?

2023-11-23.title: Create a gratitude list inspired by verses from the Psalms.
2023-11-23.question: What specific blessings can you thank God for today?

2023-11-24.title: Explore a passage from the Gospels and reflect on Jesus' teachings.
2023-11-24.question: How can you embody the qualities mentioned in the Beatitudes?

2023-11-25.title: Study a parable from the New Testament and apply its lessons.
2023-11-25.question: What lessons can you draw from the Prodigal Son story and implement in your life?

2023-11-26.title: Memorize a verse from the Book of Romans and meditate on its meaning.
2023-11-26.question: How can the assurance of God working all things for good impact your mindset?

2023-11-27.title: Choose a verse from the Epistles and apply it in a real-life situation.
2023-11-27.question: How can you rely on Christ's strength in a specific challenge you are facing?

2023-11-28.title: Share a Bible verse with a friend and discuss its impact on your lives.
2023-11-28.question: How does the verse inspire positive change and growth in your friendship?

2023-11-29.title: Explore a prophetic passage from the Old Testament and reflect on its relevance today.
2023-11-29.question: How does the promise of renewed strength encourage you in your current circumstances?

2023-11-30.title: Create a vision board for your spiritual goals using verses from the New Testament.
2023-11-30.question: How can these verses guide your vision and goals for the future?
